column1: Pz male aged 58, reaches the pulmonary stenosis for lipotymic - syncopal crisis after an effort. For some days, inflammation of the upper airways and cough. He has not traveled. No other known pathologies.
Upon entering PS: TC 37.5; SPO2 = 88%; Hemoglobin 11.50; GB 7250; Neutrophils 90.20%; Platelets 67000

Hospitalization and, in the light of the radiological finding, request for an infectious and research evaluation of Covid 19, which is positive. In the next hour worsening of dyspnea and need for hospitalization in Resuscitation.
Chest x-ray in patient in mechanical ventilation.
